story:
Once upon a time, in the enchanting island of Sri Lanka, there lived a young girl named Malini. Malini had the brightest smile and the kindest heart in all the land. She lived in a small village at the foot of a majestic mountain covered in lush green forests.

Every night before bed, Malini's grandmother would tell her a special bedtime story. These stories were filled with magic and wonder, taking Malini on incredible adventures in her dreams.

One evening, as the sun dipped below the horizon and the sky turned a deep shade of purple, Malini's grandmother began her tale.

"Once upon a time, in a faraway land, there was a beautiful garden where the flowers bloomed all year round," her grandmother began. "In this garden, there lived a magical butterfly named Surya who could sprinkle golden dust that made all the flowers grow stronger and more vibrant."

Mesmerized by the story, Malini's eyes grew heavy as she imagined the shimmering wings of the golden butterfly dancing among the flowers.

As her grandmother continued to weave the tale, Malini slowly drifted off to sleep, her mind filled with dreams of flying with Surya through the colorful garden under the moonlit sky.

The next morning, as the first rays of the sun peeked through the window, Malini woke up with a smile on her face, feeling refreshed and eager to start a new day.

From that day on, Malini's dreams were filled with magical adventures, thanks to her grandmother's bedtime stories. And every night, as she drifted off to sleep, Malini would close her eyes and journey to far-off lands, guided by the loving words of her grandmother.

And so, in the quaint village in Sri Lanka, Malini's bedtime stories continued to enchant and inspire, filling her heart with wonder and her dreams with endless possibilities.

Remember, dear Malini, the magic of your dreams and the love that surrounds you, for in that lies the truest of treasures.

Goodnight, sweet Malini, may your dreams be as bright as the stars above. Sleep tight, for tomorrow is a brand new day filled with endless possibilities.

The end.
